name: Real Moto Racing 3D
description:
A Real 3D Motorbike Racing Game.
3D scene give you unlimited pleasure, exciting feel.
Multiple kinds of motorbike to change.
City moto racing and suburban moto racing to choose.
Real road and car obstacles with real sound effects.

Game with features:
- Real 3D scene
- Three visual angle of 3D
- Fluent game control
- Various game scenes
- Superb graphic

Do you want to challenge yourself by the real 3D motorbike racing?
Please enjoy your 3D racing game.
